Chicopee.Pine Point, Springfield, Massachusetts: Pine Point is a neighborhood in Springfield, Massachusetts. Located along Boston Road -- one of Springfield's commercial thoroughfares, home to the Eastfield Mall -- the middle-class Pine Point neighborhoods features streets of cozy capes and ranches as well as some of the most interesting Craftsman style bungalows in the region.  Pine Point is located in the center of the city, beginning about two and a half miles from the Metro Center neighborhood.
